<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Two booleans are used to define orders in graphs:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InverseGraph defines when we need to reverse the whole graph and is as such</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// also equivalent to applying updates in reverse.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InverseEdge defines whether we want to change the edges direction. E.g., for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a non-inversed graph, the children are naturally the successors when</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InverseEdge is false and the predecessors when InverseEdge is true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// GraphDiff defines a CFG snapshot: given a set of Update&lt;NodePtr&gt;, provides</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a getChildren method to get a Node&#39;s children based on the additional updates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the snapshot. The current diff treats the CFG as a graph rather than a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multigraph. Added edges are pruned to be unique, and deleted edges will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remove all existing edges between two blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/graphdiff"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NodePtr, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InverseGraph = false&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/graphdiff/#a750e10bc8c7c88551781a9e1cb91bf07">GraphDiff</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// By default, it is assumed that, given a CFG and a set of updates, we wish</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to apply these updates as given. If UpdatedAreReverseApplied is set, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// updates will be applied in reverse: deleted edges are considered re-added</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and inserted edges are considered deleted when returning children.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep the list of legalized updates for a deterministic order of updates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when using a GraphDiff for incremental updates in the DominatorTree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The list is kept in reverse to allow popping from end.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/graphdiff/#abf8532d450c03fedf6af2f69f29388cf"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/graphdiff/#abf8532d450c03fedf6af2f69f29388cf">getNumLegalizedUpdates</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LegalizedUpdates.size(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/graphdiff/#ab2a3b8f6ebc0db2628ad35dc728fde42"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cfg/update">cfg::Update&lt;NodePtr&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/graphdiff/#ab2a3b8f6ebc0db2628ad35dc728fde42">popUpdateForIncrementalUpdates</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!LegalizedUpdates.empty() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;No updates to apply!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> U = LegalizedUpdates.pop&#95;back&#95;val();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsInsert =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (U.getKind() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cfg/#a90f12723ad8d5cff45b6f06408a33da8aa458be0f08b7e4ff3c0f633c100176c0">cfg::UpdateKind::Insert</a>) == !UpdatedAreReverseApplied;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;SuccDIList = Succ&#91;U.getFrom()&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;SuccList = SuccDIList.DI&#91;IsInsert&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SuccList.back() == U.getTo());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SuccList.pop&#95;back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SuccList.empty() &amp;&amp; SuccDIList.DI&#91;!IsInsert&#93;.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Succ.erase(U.getFrom());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;PredDIList = Pred&#91;U.getTo()&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;PredList = PredDIList.DI&#91;IsInsert&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PredList.back() == U.getFrom());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PredList.pop&#95;back();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PredList.empty() &amp;&amp; PredDIList.DI&#91;!IsInsert&#93;.empty())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Pred.erase(U.getTo());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> U;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/graphdiff/#a4e5916e41acfe2aac69c669015dccb14"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/graphdiff/#a4e5916e41acfe2aac69c669015dccb14">VectRet</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;NodePtr, 8&gt;</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/graphdiff/#a7c6bfaa2b8d3dbf6f4c9f4dfec66c77d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InverseEdge&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/graphdiff/#a4e5916e41acfe2aac69c669015dccb14">VectRet</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/graphdiff/#a7c6bfaa2b8d3dbf6f4c9f4dfec66c77d">getChildren</a>(NodePtr <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">DirectedNodeT =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">        std::conditional&#95;t&lt;InverseEdge, Inverse&lt;NodePtr&gt;, NodePtr&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> R = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acc2e6a2001a5f102f18060a53520e82b">children&lt;DirectedNodeT&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/graphdiff/#a4e5916e41acfe2aac69c669015dccb14">VectRet</a> Res = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/graphdiff/#a4e5916e41acfe2aac69c669015dccb14">VectRet</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/detail/#a1926e8e4789f0a0f89add386f65413d1">detail::reverse&#95;if&lt;!InverseEdge&gt;</a>(R));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove nullptr children for clang.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a60a348350395aef11d68f58111bcf499">llvm::erase</a>(Res, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Children = (InverseEdge != InverseGraph) ? Pred : Succ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = Children.find(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It == Children.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Res;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove children present in the CFG but not in the snapshot.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Child : It-&gt;second.DI&#91;0&#93;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a60a348350395aef11d68f58111bcf499">llvm::erase</a>(Res, Child);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add children present in the snapshot for not in the real CFG.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;AddedChildren = It-&gt;second.DI&#91;1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a39d3d23a084c4544ee5903203db10e8a">llvm::append&#95;range</a>(Res, AddedChildren);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Res;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/graphdiff/#a7173fb8fb0099c2b4edcc714c93b80ab"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/graphdiff/#a7173fb8fb0099c2b4edcc714c93b80ab">print</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OS &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;===== GraphDiff: CFG edge changes to create a CFG snapshot. \\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;===== (Note: notion of children/inverse&#95;children depends on &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;the direction of edges and the graph.)\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OS &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Children to delete/insert:\\n\\t&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    printMap(OS, Succ);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    printMap(OS, Pred);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OS &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
